queries.query: INSERT INTO TB_TITULAR( NR_MATRICULA, NM_TITULAR, NR_CPF, DT_NASCIMENTO, DT_ADMISSAO, USER_CREATED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
UPDATE TB_TITULAR SET NR_MATRICULA = ?, NM_TITULAR = ?, NR_CPF = ?, DT_NASCIMENTO = ?, DT_ADMISSAO = ?, USER_CREATED = ?, USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
